import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd
source.f9c1bf2e:
# Reading Dataset 

path_india='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/IN_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_brazil='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/BR_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_canada='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/CA_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_germany='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/DE_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_france='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/FR_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_greatbritain='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/GB_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_japan='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/JP_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_mexico='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/MX_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_usa='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/US_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_southkorea='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/KR_youtube_trending_data.csv'
path_russia='../input/youtube-trending-video-dataset/RU_youtube_trending_data.csv'

df_india = pd.read_csv(path_india)
df_brazil = pd.read_csv(path_brazil)
df_canada = pd.read_csv(path_canada)
df_germany = pd.read_csv(path_germany)
df_france = pd.read_csv(path_france)
df_greatbritain = pd.read_csv(path_greatbritain)
df_japan = pd.read_csv(path_japan)
df_mexico = pd.read_csv(path_mexico)
df_usa = pd.read_csv(path_usa)
df_southkorea = pd.read_csv(path_southkorea)
df_russia = pd.read_csv(path_russia)

source.b8ebd05e:
# Concatinating all the data frames

frames = [df_india,df_brazil,df_canada,df_germany,df_france,df_russia,df_greatbritain,df_japan, df_mexico, df_usa, df_southkorea]
df_world = pd.concat(frames)

print(count_df)

print(count_df)

df_world = df_world.drop(columns=['thumbnail_link', 'ratings_disabled'])
